translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters We're human in the daylight ♪
translation.es: Los Supermonstruos Humanos de día somos

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters We become monsters at night ♪
translation.es: Los Supermonstruos Nos convertimos de noche

translation.en: ♪ Sun down! Monsters up! ♪
Woah! That's a lot of decorations!
And that's a lot of twinkle lights!
Oh! These twinkle lights are so tangled, even the knots have knots!
translation.es: Están tan enredadas, que incluso los nudos tienen nudos.

translation.en: Don't worry, Igor, we'll help you untangle the lights!
translation.es: Tranquilo, Igor. Te ayudaremos a desenredarlas.

translation.en: And we'll help you hang them up too.
But first, we need to untangle you!
translation.es: Pero, primero, debemos desenredarte a ti.

translation.en: Oh! Thanks, kiddos.  I'm not sure how this happened!
translation.es: Gracias, chicos. No sé cómo pasó.

translation.en: - It's OK. - We've got this.
Oh! Ho, ho, ho.
Merry Christmas, everyone!
Spike, it isn't quite Christmas yet. It's still Christmas Eve!
translation.es: Spike, todavía no es Navidad. Aún es Nochebuena.

translation.en: Oh, OK! Merry Christmas Eve, everyone!
Merry Christmas Eve, Spike!
Santa always says that... Oh!
...twinkle lights and decorations really put him in the holiday spirit!
translation.es: las luces de Navidad y los adornos le dan el espíritu navideño.

translation.en: Tonight, I want to try and make Santa the biggest,
translation.es: Esta noche, intentaré ofrecerle a Santa la más grande

translation.en: brightest,
holiday display ever!
We can use our superpowers to help!
Aha! I can't wait to get started!
Well, you won't have to wait much longer look!
Sun down!  Monsters up!
Drac!
Katya.
Lobo!
Zoe.
Frankie!
Cleo!
Spike!
Vida!
Super Monsters!
Igor, I know Santa loves holiday decorations...
translation.es: Igor, sé que Santa adora los adornos festivos...

translation.en: - He sure does! - But, remember,
translation.es: ¡Claro que sí! ...pero recuerda que hay otras maneras de celebrar las fiestas.

translation.en: there are other ways to celebrate the holiday too...
translation.es: ...pero recuerda que hay otras maneras de celebrar las fiestas.

translation.en: Well of course there are! But...
with the Super Monsters using all their powers to help me decorate the school,
translation.es: Pero con la ayuda de los Supermonstruos para decorar la escuela,

translation.en: this year will be the biggest and brightest celebration
translation.es: este año será la celebración más grande y brillante

translation.en: Santa's ever seen! Oh, he's going to love it!
translation.es: ¡que Santa haya visto alguna vez! ¡Le encantará!

translation.en: Igor, how many of these twinkle lights do you want us to put up?
translation.es: Igor, ¿cuántas de estas luces quieres que colguemos?

translation.en: All of them!
All of them? Really?
OK!
Does that mean we should use all of these decorations too?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿debemos usar todos estos adornos también?

translation.en: Of course! Only the best for Santa!
translation.es: Claro. Solo lo mejor para Santa.

translation.en: On it! Mega- size! Let's start over there!
♪ Here with our friends Working together we have fun ♪
♪ Come, give a hand That is the way we get things done ♪
♪ Working together We're Super Monsters ♪
translation.es: Trabajamos juntos Somos Supermonstruos, aquí vamos

translation.en: ♪ Here we come We're all in together ♪
translation.es: Somos Supermonstruos, aquí vamos Crecemos juntos, trabajamos y jugamos

translation.en: ♪ We work and play That's how we get things done ♪
translation.es: Crecemos juntos, trabajamos y jugamos Así hacemos las cosas

translation.en: ♪ Tan, tan, ta- ran ♪
It looks amazing!
Thanks, Katya. Um... Zoe, how do we get out of here?
translation.es: Gracias, Katya. Zoe, ¿cómo salimos de aquí?

translation.en: - This way! -
- That's all the twinkle lights! - Beautiful! - We did it. - Santa's going to love it.
Well done, Super Monsters! That's everything we had in the attic.
translation.es: Bien hecho, Supermonstruos. Es todo lo del ático.

translation.en: Now, let's put up these decorations from the basement!
But there isn't anything left to decorate!
translation.es: Pero no hay nada para adornar.

translation.en: Oh, there is one thing left. And it wouldn't be Christmas without it...
translation.es: Queda una cosa, y no sería Navidad sin él.

translation.en: The Christmas Tree!
I'll get it! Mega- size!
Here it is!
Igor, before we decorate the tree, can we turn on the other decorations?
translation.es: Igor, antes de adornarlo, ¿encendemos las luces?

translation.en: Aww! I can't wait to see everything all lit up!
Of course we can!
Frankie, I'll turn on the twinkle lights,
if you'll power up the rest of the decorations.
translation.es: si enciendes el resto de los adornos.

translation.en: - Ready? - Ready!
Frankie- mash, monster- smash!
Uh- huh! We did it!
Uh- oh, that's not good.
Oh, no! My monster- smash blew out the lights!
No, Frankie, this wasn't your fault!
translation.es: No, Frankie. No fue tu culpa.

translation.en: I should have known that all those extra lights and decorations
translation.es: Debí saber que tantas luces y adornos requerirían mucha energía, pero...

translation.en: would take too much power, but I did it anyway.
translation.es: Debí saber que tantas luces y adornos requerirían mucha energía, pero... ...seguí adelante.

translation.en: And look what happened.
I ruined Christmas for everyone!
- Poor Igor! - He's really upset.
We should go find him. Maybe we can help him feel better.
translation.es: Deberíamos buscarlo. Podríamos hacerlo sentir mejor.

translation.en: Good idea, Frankie.
Igor, where are you? Where'd he go?
- Not in there. - Not here either.
Found him!
Igor? We've been looking for you.
We were worried about you!
- Are you OK? - I'm sorry, Super Monsters.
I got so carried away with trying to make the biggest,
translation.es: Me entusiasmé tanto tratando de hacer la decoración más grande y brillante

translation.en: brightest holiday display ever...
translation.es: tratando de hacer la decoración más grande y brillante

translation.en: that I blew out all the power and I ruined Christmas!
translation.es: que corté toda la luz y arruiné la Navidad.

translation.en: It's OK, Igor! Everybody makes mistakes.
translation.es: - Está bien, Igor. - Todos cometemos errores.

translation.en: Oh! Thank you, kiddos.
And you didn't ruin Christmas. We can still decorate the tree!
translation.es: - No arruinaste la Navidad. - Podemos decorar el árbol.

translation.en: But... no one will be able to see it in the dark.
translation.es: Pero nadie lo verá en la oscuridad.

translation.en: Don't worry, Igor, we'll find a way to make it special.
translation.es: Tranquilo, Igor. Veremos cómo hacerlo especial.

translation.en: I bet my dad will know how to fix the power!
translation.es: Mi papá podrá arreglar la electricidad.

translation.en: I just called him! Mr. Mash is on his way!
translation.es: Recién lo llamé. El Sr. Mash está viniendo.

translation.en: Oh, that's great!
Maybe he can turn the lights back on before Santa gets here!
translation.es: Quizá repare la luz antes de que llegue Santa.

translation.en: It looks like somebody got their power working.
translation.es: Parece que alguien tiene luz. Miren allí.

translation.en: Over there! See those twinkly lights?
translation.es: Parece que alguien tiene luz. Miren allí. Las luces de Navidad.

translation.en: - Those aren't twinkly lights! - They're fire dragonflies!
translation.es: No son luces de Navidad. Son libélulas de fuego.

translation.en: Come on, Spike! Let's go!
- Ready, Spike? - Ready, Cleo!
- Wow! Awesome! - Beautiful!
♪ We lay together around the tree And see our best friends there ♪
translation.es: Nos encanta rodear el árbol Y ver a nuestros mejores amigos

translation.en: ♪ It's not about the things we have It's about the things we share ♪
translation.es: No es lo que tenemos Es lo que compartimos

translation.en: ♪ Then in turn together. Aha! It's the best time of the year ♪
translation.es: Pasar más tiempo juntos Es la mejor época del año

translation.en: ♪ How it is so much fun Whenever friends are near ♪
translation.es: Las fiestas son muy divertidas Con los amigos cerca

translation.en: - Igor? What's the matter? - Don't you like the tree?
translation.es: - Igor, ¿qué pasa? - ¿No te gusta el árbol?

translation.en: Oh, I don't just like it. I love it!
translation.es: No solo me gusta. Me encanta.

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho! So do I!
Santa Claus!
Igor, my old friend!
I've never seen a more beautiful Christmas tree.
translation.es: No había visto un árbol de Navidad más bello.

translation.en: I can tell it was decorated with true Holiday Spirit!
translation.es: Veo que fue decorado con verdadero espíritu navideño.

translation.en: It certainly was!
Thank you, Super Monsters.
You reminded me that the most important thing about celebrating the holidays
translation.es: Me recordaron que lo más importante de celebrar las fiestas

translation.en: isn't how you celebrate it, but who you celebrate it with.
translation.es: no es cómo lo celebras, sino con quién lo haces.

translation.en: I've fixed the power!
You can turn the lights back on as soon as you want.
translation.es: Pueden encender las luces cuando quieran.

translation.en: Thanks, Dad!
But could we leave the lights off just a little while longer?
translation.es: Pero ¿podemos dejarlas apagadas un ratito más?

translation.en: Of course we can, Frankie.
Glorb, you're absolutely right! This tree does need a star on top.
translation.es: Glorb, tienes toda la razón. Este árbol precisa una estrella en la punta.

translation.en: Which one would you like?
Really? From up there?
How about that one?
There you go!
Thank you, Santa, it's perfect!
I think it's time to say goodnight!
And I think it's time to turn the power back on.
translation.es: Y es hora de encender la luz.

translation.en: Ready, Dad?
Monster- smash!
Thank you, Frankie. And Merry Christmas!
Merry Christmas, Mrs. Carradine!
Well I guess we have to take down some of the lights,
or the power will blow out again.
translation.es: o la luz se cortará de nuevo.

translation.en: Poor, Igor, he's so disappointed.
Dad, isn't there some way we can use our monster powers to light up all of Igor's decorations?
translation.es: Papá, ¿podremos usar nuestros superpoderes para encender todos los adornos de Igor?

translation.en: Well, we can try.
Maybe I can add a little Christmas magic to your monster magic?
translation.es: Quizá pueda sumar un poco de magia navideña a su monstruo magia.

translation.en: Let's get these decorations powered up.
Monster- smash.
Oh, it's just how I imagined it! Thank you!
translation.es: - ¡Qué bonito! - Así lo imaginé. Gracias. Hicieron mi sueño realidad.

translation.en: You made my holiday wish come true!
Maybe we could add a few more lights.
Igor!
You know, old friend, I think it looks perfect just the way it is!
translation.es: Viejo amigo, creo que así está perfecto.

translation.en: Santa, can you stay for snack time?
Igor made ginger snaps with lemon icing.
translation.es: Igor preparó galletas de jengibre con limón.

translation.en: Oh, ho! My favorite cookies!
But I really can't stay much longer.
The reindeer and I still have a lot of gifts to deliver.
Huh! Was that a reindeer?
Were those Santa's reindeer?
- Well, Santa's sleigh is still here. - But what happened to the reindeer?
translation.es: Su trineo sigue aquí. ¿Qué pasó con los renos?

translation.en: - Someone untied his reins. - Who would do that?
translation.es: - Alguien desató sus riendas. - ¿Quién haría eso?

translation.en: Oh, ho ho, I think I know who...
Glorb! Henri!
You two are very naughty Monster Pets.
translation.es: Son dos mascotas monstruo muy traviesas.

translation.en: It's OK, Katya. Henri was just being playful.
translation.es: Está bien, Katya. Henri quería jugar, y Glorb se comportó como Glorb.

translation.en: And Glorb was just being Glorb.
translation.es: Henri quería jugar, y Glorb se comportó como Glorb.

translation.en: But... what about your reindeer?
Oh, I'm sure they're just having a little fun
and playing one of their reindeer games!
translation.es: y jugando a uno de sus juegos.

translation.en: What kind of games do they play?
Their favorite game is Hide and Seek!
Oh! We love playing Hide and Seek!
Don't worry, Santa,
translation.es: Calma, Santa. Hallaremos a tus renos.

translation.en: I'm sure we can find your reindeer, no matter where they're hiding!
translation.es: Calma, Santa. Hallaremos a tus renos. Donde sea que estén.

translation.en: Come on! We need to get the other Super Monsters and...
translation.es: ¡Vamos! Busquemos a los otros Supermonstruos y...

translation.en: Find those reindeer!
Super Monsters, Santa is counting on us. We can't let him down.
translation.es: Santa cuenta con nosotros. ¡No lo defraudemos!

translation.en: Let's go!
- We're sorry, Santa. - We looked everywhere!
translation.es: Lo sentimos, Santa. - Buscamos en todos lados. - No los hallamos.

translation.en: But we can't find them.
translation.es: - Buscamos en todos lados. - No los hallamos.

translation.en: I told you they were really good at hiding.
translation.es: Les dije que eran muy buenos.

translation.en: But I need to find them soon,
or I won't have enough time to deliver Christmas presents
translation.es: o no tendré tiempo de entregar los regalos

translation.en: to everyone in Pitchfork Pines!
Oh, no!
You mean our friends could wake up on Christmas morning and not have any presents?
We can't let that happen.
I'll keep looking for them. They can't have gone too far.
translation.es: Seguiré buscándolos. No pueden estar lejos.

translation.en: If we can't find the reindeer... maybe there's another way we can help.
translation.es: Si no los hallamos, quizá podamos ayudar de otra forma.

translation.en: Well, I'm not a flying reindeer,
translation.es: No soy un reno volador, pero sí un vampiro volador.

translation.en: but I am a flying vampire. Maybe I can pull Santa's sleigh!
translation.es: No soy un reno volador, pero sí un vampiro volador. Tiraré del trineo de Santa.

translation.en: Bats! It's too heavy. Let me help you! Roar!
I'll help too. Mummy power!
- Watch out! - Be careful!
Mega- size! Wow, the sleigh is really heavy,
translation.es: ¡Tamaño gigante! ¡Guau! Este trineo es muy pesado. Incluso para mi tamaño gigante.

translation.en: even for mega- me.
translation.es: ¡Guau! Este trineo es muy pesado. Incluso para mi tamaño gigante.

translation.en: Oh, I have an idea!
Holiday magic bright and shiny, the sleigh is too big, let's make it tiny!
translation.es: Magia festiva, brillante y luminosa Que el trineo muy grande se haga pequeño

translation.en: OK, the sleigh and I are ready to fly!
translation.es: Bien. El trineo y yo estamos listos para volar.

translation.en: That's a great spell, Katya, but won't it make the presents too small?
translation.es: Qué buen hechizo, Katya, pero ¿los regalos no serán muy pequeños?

translation.en: Oops... good point!
Holiday magic, that wasn't the way, Santa Claus needs a much bigger sleigh!
translation.es: Magia festiva, no era así Santa Claus precisa un trineo más grande

translation.en: I still can't find my reindeer...
Super Monsters, can you use your super powers to help Santa fly his sleigh?
translation.es: Supermonstruos, ¿pueden ayudar a que Santa vuele su trineo con sus superpoderes?

translation.en: - We've been trying! - Drac pulled...
- And Spike helped push. - Cleo added her wind power...
translation.es: - Spike empujó. - Cleo usó su poder.

translation.en: And Katya used her magic!
Oh, dear. If all of you working together didn't help, I don't know what will.
translation.es: Cielos. Si trabajaron juntos y no ayudó, no sé qué lo hará.

translation.en: I do! You already know how to work together...
translation.es: Yo sí. Ya saben trabajar juntos. Pero esto los ayudará a volar juntos.

translation.en: but this will help you fly together.
translation.es: Ya saben trabajar juntos. Pero esto los ayudará a volar juntos.

translation.en: First, we'll need a really strong, stretchy rope.
translation.es: Precisaremos una soga fuerte y elástica.

translation.en: Oh! Instead of stretchy rope, how about stretchy vines?
translation.es: En vez de una soga elástica, ¿qué tal lianas elásticas?

translation.en: May I?
Yeah!
Perfect!
Ooh, ooh! Can I drive?
Super Monsters, let's fly!
Ho, ho, ho! It's working!
- Well done! - It works!
Now everyone in Pitchfork Pines will get their Christmas presents!
translation.es: Ahora todos recibirán los regalos de Navidad.

translation.en: I hope so, but I might not be able to deliver all the presents before the sun comes up.
translation.es: Ojalá, pero quizá no llegue a entregarlos todos antes de que salga el sol.

translation.en: - But you have to! - I'll try my best, Frankie.
translation.es: ¡Pero debe lograrlo! Haré lo imposible, Frankie, pero bajar por las chimeneas lleva tiempo.

translation.en: But climbing down chimneys takes a lot of time.
translation.es: Haré lo imposible, Frankie, pero bajar por las chimeneas lleva tiempo.

translation.en: Oh! I can use my zombie powers to help! Then you won't need the chimneys.
translation.es: Ayudaré con mis poderes zombi. Así no precisará chimeneas.

translation.en: I can use my mega- strength to carry the bag of presents!
translation.es: Usaré mi megafuerza para llevar las bolsas.

translation.en: And I'll use my werewolf speed to help put the presents under the trees fast, fast, fast!
translation.es: ¡Pondré los regalos bajo los árboles con mi supervelocidad!

translation.en: Oh, ho, ho, ho! Sounds like we have a plan.
We're going to save Christmas!
Oh, no! The roof's too steep to land.
translation.es: Ay, el techo es muy empinado.

translation.en: The sleigh will slide right off.
But if we land on the ground, someone might see us.
translation.es: Si aterrizamos en el suelo, alguien nos verá.

translation.en: It'll spoil the surprise.
It's OK, Spike. Vida's with us.
translation.es: Calma, Spike. Vida está con nosotros.

translation.en: This way, Santa!
Let's go, let's go!
♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way ♪
♪ Oh, what fun is it to ride On a one- horse open sleigh ♪
translation.es: Con sus notas de alegría Va anunciando él

translation.en: ♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way ♪
♪ Oh, what fun is it to ride On a one- horse open sleigh ♪
translation.es: Cascabel, cascabel Lindo cascabel Con sus notas de alegría Va anunciando él

translation.en: ♪ Dashing through the snow In a one- horse open sleigh ♪
translation.es: Ha llegado Navidad La familia alegre está

translation.en: ♪ Through the fields we go Laughing all the way ♪
translation.es: Celebrando Nochebuena En la paz del santo hogar

translation.en: ♪ Bells on bobtail ring Making spirits bright ♪
translation.es: Ha llegado Navidad La familia alegre está

translation.en: ♪ What fun it is to ride and sing A sleighing song tonight ♪
translation.es: Celebrando Nochebuena En la paz del santo hogar

translation.en: ♪ Oh, jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way! ♪
♪ Oh, what fun is it to ride In a one- horse open sleigh ♪
translation.es: Con sus notas de alegría Va anunciando él

translation.en: We did it! We delivered presents to everyone.
Well done, Super Monsters! You saved Christmas in Pitchfork Pines!
translation.es: ¡Bien hecho, Supermonstruos! ¡Salvaron la Navidad en Los Pinos!

translation.en: Oh, there you are! I know you were having fun,
but did you forget we have an important job to do?
If it hadn't been for the Super Monsters, Christmas in Pitchfork Pines would have been ruined.
translation.es: La Navidad en Los Pinos no se arruinó gracias a los Supermonstruos.

translation.en: Thank you for all your help, Super Monsters.
I couldn't have done it without you.
translation.es: No lo habría logrado sin ustedes.

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho! Merry Christmas!
Merry Christmas, Santa!
What an awesome night!
And it just got awesome! Look!
Presents!
Aww, Santa gave Henri a new cat toy!
translation.es: ¡Santa le dio a Henri un gato de juguete!

translation.en: And he gave Glorb a Teddy Bat!
translation.es: Y a Glorb un murciélago de peluche.

translation.en: And he gave us the best gift we could ever wish for!
translation.es: ¡Y nos dio el mejor regalo que pudiéramos desear!

translation.en: - How do you know? - You haven't even opened them yet.
Oh, we know those presents are going to be great!
But the best present was being able to work together...
translation.es: Pero el mejor regalo fue trabajar juntos.

translation.en: and help Santa save Christmas!
translation.es: ¡Y ayudar a Santa a salvar la Navidad!

translation.en: Now that's what the holiday spirit is all about!
It certainly is!
Sun up! Super Monsters!
Merry Christmas, everyone!
♪ La la la la la la Super Monsters ♪
♪ Super Monsters ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters We're human in the daylight ♪
translation.es: Los Supermonstruos Humanos de día somos

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters We become monsters at night ♪
translation.es: Los Supermonstruos Nos convertimos de noche

translation.en: ♪ In Pitchfork Pines we learn And help each other grow ♪
translation.es: En Los Pinos aprendemos Y crecemos juntos

translation.en: ♪ There's magic in twilight That's when we start to glow ♪
translation.es: En el crepúsculo empezamos a brillar

translation.en: ♪ Sun down Monsters up! ♪
♪ I'm Drac, flying fast ♪
♪ Cleo, wind power Spike, dragon clouds ♪
translation.es: Cleo, poder del viento Spike, nube de dragón

translation.en: ♪ Zoe, zombie vision Lobo, super speed ♪
♪ Katya, magic spells Frankie, stomp ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters Monsters ♪
